oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gravesite of Harold Adkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gravesite of Harold Adkins. Harold was killed after an accident in which he was dragged behind a horse. He was 14 years old at the time that he died. He is buried in Greenwood Cemetery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adkins, Harold, 1912-1926; Funeral service
